attributes.action: Comply with Labour's manifesto and join the Euro
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK pound is in terminal decline is now a fourth tier currency and irrelevant in today's globalised world. We would better placed adopting the Euro oe even the US dollar as our currency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
